  • Method Details

    • searchPart

      public void searchPart​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Searches for Part. I had to check if tempList is null because the function lookupProduct() returns an observable list or null if not products are found. As well, I had to check if the first element in the observable list is null because the .add() function returns a product or null if not found.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - Key event Enter handler to listen for Enter key to be pressed. Function will then search for part.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Loader throws a Runtime Exception if it cannot retrieve the FXML document. The initPart() will also throw a IOException if no product is selected from the table. The error will be caught and a message dialog box will appear.

    • addAssociatedBtn

      Parameters:

    • saveBtn

      private void saveBtn​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates and updates inventory.
      Parameters:
      event - Mouse event handler to save Product.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Main.initErrorMessageBox throws a Runtime Exception if it cannot retrieve the FXML document inside that class. The error will be caught and a message dialog box will appear.
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - Runtime error may occur if the method tries to parse a value from a text field that does not belong. Error will be caught and error message dialog box will display. In the future, it would be better to do each validation in a separate function and return the value needed there or return booleans for each and evaluate in an IF statement.

    • isDuplicatePart

      private boolean isDuplicatePart​(Part partToAdd)
      Checks for a duplicate part in associated parts list.
      Parameters:
      partToAdd - Part to check to see if it is a duplicate in the temporary object's associated list
      Returns:
      False if it is in the associated list. Otherwise, return true.

    • isValid

      private boolean isValid​(java.lang.String minMaxValue) throws java.io.IOException
      Checks to see if min and max are valid inputs.
      Parameters:
      minMaxValue - String to determine if min or max is being evaluated.
      Returns:
      True if min is > 0 and less than max, else return false. Same for max evaluation
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Main.initErrorMessageBox throws a Runtime Exception if it cannot retrieve the FXML document inside that class. The error will be caught and a message dialog box will appear.

    • clearFields

      private void clearFields()
      Clears all text fields.

    • isDuplicateProductName

      private boolean isDuplicateProductName​(java.lang.String productName) throws java.io.IOException
      Checks main.inv whether a product name is a duplicate within.
      Parameters:
      productName - Product name to check to see if it is a duplicate part name in main inventory.
      Returns:
      Returns false if it is a duplicate name that exists in the main inventory. Otherwise, it returns true.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Main.initErrorMessageBox throws a Runtime Exception if it cannot retrieve the FXML document inside that class. The error will be caught and a message dialog box will appear.

    • isNumber

      private boolean isNumber​(java.lang.String isNum)
      Checks to see if all characters in the string are numbers and return a boolean.
      Parameters:
      isNum - String to check whether a string is a whole number.
      Returns:
      Return false is one character is not a number, return true if all characters are numbers.

    • resetInit

      private void resetInit()
      Resets part table and text field.

    • isStockBetweenMaxMin

      private boolean isStockBetweenMaxMin()
      Checks to see if the stock is between max and min.
      Returns:
      True if stock is between min and max variables, else return false.
